name: Dr. Lisa Tran
motivations: Lisa chose to become a chemist to innovate new materials that can contribute to sustainable development and environmental solutions.
biography: Dr. Lisa Tran holds a PhD in chemistry and works as a research chemist in a leading materials science company, focusing on creating eco-friendly compounds.
